CustomField.formula: AssignedContact.MailingStreet & BR() & AssignedContact.MailingCity & IF(AssignedContact.MailingState="", "", ", " & AssignedContact.MailingState) & " " & AssignedContact.MailingPostalCode & BR() & AssignedContact.MailingCountry
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The mailing address for the 'Report Contact'
CustomField.label: Address
